content: glove lg = instructions for the left glove read the whole pattern before you start knitting note separate charts are provided for each size be sure to use the cor- rect chart corresponding to the size being knit © julia mueller - page 1 - cuff work chart 3 ribbing part 1 on the fi rst 22 sts on rg needle 1 k2 6 10 work chart 4 ribbing part work round 1 of chart 1 cuff on needle 1 and 2 on the remaining sts of needle 1 work chart 2 *k1tbl p2 k1tbl* on needle 2 till you fi nish the last cable panel on needle 2 round of the chart when you ve completed the last round on chart 3 and 4 continue in stockinette stitch on needle 1 till lg you ve fi nished round 29 32 35 work *k1tbl p2 k1tbl* on needle 1 and chart 1 cuff on needle 2 till you reach the last round of go on working chart 2 on needle 2 at the same the chart work the last round up to stitch 27 of time proceed on needle 1 as follows chart 1 do not work the last 7 sts round 30 33 36 in this round the sts for the hand thumb gusset need to be put on hold on needle rg 1 k25 27 29 then transfer 21 23 25 sts on a before starting with the hand chart you have to piece of waste yarn cast on 2 sts using the back- change the beginning of the round by working 7 ward loop method sts of needle 1 k1tbl p2 k2tbl p2 and shifting round 31 34 37 knit all sts them to needle 2 round 32 35 38 k 25 27 29 ssk work chart 2 cable panel on needle 1 chart 3 proceed working stockinette st on needle 1 and ribbing part 1 on the fi rst 22 sts of needle 2 k2 chart 2 on needle 2 until you have completed 6 10 work chart 4 ribbing part 2 on the remai- round 37 41 44 of chart 2 ning 22 sts when you ve completed the last round on chart 3 work chart 6 corresponding to your size and 4 continue in stockinette stitch on needle 2 till at the end of row 6 and in the beginning of row 7 you ve fi nished round 29 32 35 put 15 16 17 sts for the pinky on waste yarn and cast on two sts as indicated in the chart go on working chart 2 on needle 1 at the same do not work round 9 time proceed on needle 2 as follows fingers round 30 33 36 in this round the sts for the the last round on the charts 5 and 6 indicates thumb gusset need to be put on hold on needle which stitches will end up being which fi nger and 2 transfer 21 23 25 sts on
